products.title: Products

newProduct.title: Add New Product
newProduct.subtitle: Fill in the product details below
newProduct.basicInfoDesc: Enter the product name, description, category, and brand
newProduct.urlSlugDesc: Auto-generated from product name. You can customize it.
newProduct.mediaDesc: Add product images and videos (up to 8 images, 3 videos)
newProduct.imageRequirements: PNG, JPG, WebP up to 5MB (will be compressed to 1MB)
newProduct.videoUrlDesc: YouTube, Vimeo, or direct video URL
newProduct.pricingInventoryDesc: Set prices, stock levels, and SKU
newProduct.costPerItemDesc: Your cost (for profit calculation, not shown to customers)
newProduct.lowStockAlertDesc: Get notified when stock falls below this
newProduct.specificationsDesc: Size, concentration, and other product specs
newProduct.classificationDesc: Classify your product for better discoverability by customers
newProduct.productTypeDesc: What type of fragrance is this? (Required)
newProduct.occasionsDesc: Comma-separated list of occasions (OFFICE, DAILY, PARTY, WEDDING, RAMADAN, EID)
newProduct.oudTypeDesc: Leave empty if product doesn't contain oud
newProduct.collectionDesc: Which special collection does this belong to?
newProduct.priceSegmentDesc: What price segment does this product belong to? (Required)
newProduct.enableWhatsappDesc: Allow customers to order this product via WhatsApp
newProduct.coinsToAwardDesc: Reward coins customers earn when purchasing this product
newProduct.isActiveDesc: Make this product visible to customers
newProduct.isFeaturedDesc: Show this product in featured sections
newProduct.putOnSaleDesc: Mark this product as on sale
newProduct.productCreatedImagesFailed: Product created, but some images failed to upload
newProduct.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields correctly

SIGNATURE.name: Our Brand Signature Collection
SIGNATURE.desc: Handcrafted with passion, exclusively by Antique Oud. Discover our finest creations that embody luxury and tradition.
SIGNATURE.subtitle: Curated with excellence

MOST_LOVED.name: Most Loved Fragrances
MOST_LOVED.desc: Customer favorites that have captured hearts. These are the fragrances our community can't get enough of.
MOST_LOVED.subtitle: Curated with excellence

TRENDING.name: Trending Now
TRENDING.desc: The hottest scents of the season. Stay ahead with fragrances everyone is talking about.
TRENDING.subtitle: Curated with excellence

RAMADAN.name: Ramadan Collection
RAMADAN.desc: Sacred scents for the blessed month. Traditional and spiritual fragrances perfect for Ramadan.
RAMADAN.subtitle: Curated with excellence

EXCLUSIVE.name: Exclusive Collection
EXCLUSIVE.desc: Limited edition masterpieces. Rare and exquisite fragrances for the discerning collector.
EXCLUSIVE.subtitle: Curated with excellence

CELEBRITY.name: Celebrity Collection
CELEBRITY.desc: Signature scents from your favorite celebrities. Experience the glamour and allure.
CELEBRITY.subtitle: Curated with excellence

men.title: Men's Fragrances
men.subtitle: Bold & Sophisticated Scents
men.description: Explore our curated collection of masculine fragrances. From bold oud to fresh aquatic scents, find your signature scent that commands attention and leaves a lasting impression.

women.title: Women's Fragrances
women.subtitle: Elegant & Luxurious Scents
women.description: Discover elegant and luxurious fragrances for women. From delicate florals to rich oriental blends, find the perfect scent that celebrates your femininity and grace.

unisex.title: Unisex Fragrances
unisex.subtitle: Scents for Everyone
unisex.description: Explore versatile fragrances that transcend gender boundaries. Universal scents that celebrate individuality and personal expression.

floral.name: Floral
floral.title: Floral Perfumes
floral.subtitle: Discover the Art of Floral Fragrances
floral.description: Delicate and romantic, floral perfumes feature beautiful notes of roses, jasmine, and lily. Perfect for those who appreciate classic elegance.

oriental.name: Oriental
oriental.title: Oriental Perfumes
oriental.subtitle: Discover the Art of Oriental Fragrances
oriental.description: Warm and exotic, oriental fragrances blend amber, vanilla, and spices. Experience the rich heritage of Middle Eastern perfumery.

woody.name: Woody
woody.title: Woody Perfumes
woody.subtitle: Discover the Art of Woody Fragrances
woody.description: Earthy and sophisticated, woody scents feature sandalwood, cedar, and oud. Timeless fragrances that exude confidence.

fresh.name: Fresh
fresh.title: Fresh Perfumes
fresh.subtitle: Discover the Art of Fresh Fragrances
fresh.description: Clean and invigorating, fresh fragrances bring crisp notes of citrus and green. Perfect for daily wear and active lifestyles.

citrus.name: Citrus
citrus.title: Citrus Perfumes
citrus.subtitle: Discover the Art of Citrus Fragrances
citrus.description: Bright and energizing, citrus perfumes feature lemon, bergamot, and orange. Uplifting scents that refresh and revitalize.

fruity.name: Fruity
fruity.title: Fruity Perfumes
fruity.subtitle: Discover the Art of Fruity Fragrances
fruity.description: Sweet and playful, fruity fragrances blend apple, peach, and berries. Fun and youthful scents for the vibrant spirit.

spicy.name: Spicy
spicy.title: Spicy Perfumes
spicy.subtitle: Discover the Art of Spicy Fragrances
spicy.description: Bold and warm, spicy perfumes feature cinnamon, cardamom, and pepper. Captivating scents that leave an impression.

aquatic.name: Aquatic
aquatic.title: Aquatic Perfumes
aquatic.subtitle: Discover the Art of Aquatic Fragrances
aquatic.description: Fresh and oceanic, aquatic fragrances evoke the sea breeze. Cool and modern scents for the contemporary individual.

green.name: Green
green.title: Green Perfumes
green.subtitle: Discover the Art of Green Fragrances
green.description: Natural and crisp, green fragrances feature grass and herbal notes. Refreshing scents that connect with nature.

gourmand.name: Gourmand
gourmand.title: Gourmand Perfumes
gourmand.subtitle: Discover the Art of Gourmand Fragrances
gourmand.description: Sweet and indulgent, gourmand perfumes feature vanilla, caramel, and chocolate. Delicious scents you'll want to wear.

UAE.name: United Arab Emirates
UAE.description: Discover luxury fragrances from the United Arab Emirates. Experience the rich perfumery tradition of Dubai and Abu Dhabi.

SAUDI.name: Saudi Arabia
SAUDI.description: Explore authentic Arabian perfumes from Saudi Arabia. Traditional oud and oriental scents from the heart of Arabia.

KUWAIT.name: Kuwait
KUWAIT.description: Premium fragrances from Kuwait. Sophisticated blends that reflect Gulf heritage and modern luxury.

FRANCE.name: France
FRANCE.description: Classic French perfumery at its finest. Elegant and timeless scents from the perfume capital of the world.

ITALY.name: Italy
ITALY.description: Italian luxury and craftsmanship. Refined fragrances that embody La Dolce Vita.

UK.name: United Kingdom
UK.description: Explore premium fragrances from United Kingdom.

USA.name: United States
USA.description: Explore premium fragrances from United States.

INDIA.name: India
INDIA.description: Rich and diverse scents from India. Traditional attars and modern perfumes with exotic ingredients.

THAILAND.name: Thailand
THAILAND.description: Exotic fragrances from Thailand. Sweet and tropical scents infused with Thai heritage.

OFFICE.title: Office Fragrances
OFFICE.subtitle: Professional & Subtle
OFFICE.description: Sophisticated scents perfect for the workplace. Professional fragrances that make the right impression without overwhelming.

DAILY.title: Daily Wear Fragrances
DAILY.subtitle: Fresh & Comfortable
DAILY.description: Versatile scents for everyday use. Light and fresh fragrances that become your signature scent.

PARTY.title: Party Fragrances
PARTY.subtitle: Bold & Captivating
PARTY.description: Make an entrance with bold party scents. Fragrances that stand out in social settings and leave lasting impressions.

WEDDING.title: Wedding Fragrances
WEDDING.subtitle: Luxurious & Memorable
WEDDING.description: Celebrate special moments with elegant scents. Luxurious fragrances perfect for weddings and formal events.

RAMADAN.title: Ramadan Fragrances
RAMADAN.subtitle: Traditional & Sacred
RAMADAN.description: Spiritual scents for the blessed month. Traditional fragrances that enhance the sacred atmosphere of Ramadan.

EID.title: Eid Fragrances
EID.subtitle: Festive & Joyful
EID.description: Celebrate Eid with special fragrances. Festive scents that mark the joyous occasion.

DATE.title: Date Night Fragrances
DATE.subtitle: Romantic & Alluring
DATE.description: Find the perfect scent for romantic moments.

CAMBODIAN.title: Cambodian Oud
CAMBODIAN.subtitle: Rare & Exquisite
CAMBODIAN.description: Experience the finest Cambodian oud. Rare and exquisite with deep woody notes and unmatched complexity.

INDIAN.title: Indian Oud
INDIAN.subtitle: Rich & Bold
INDIAN.description: Discover authentic Indian oud. Rich, bold, and intensely aromatic with deep, resinous character.

THAI.title: Thai Oud
THAI.subtitle: Sweet & Smooth
THAI.description: Explore premium Thai oud. Sweet and smooth with honey-like undertones and gentle warmth.

MALAYSIAN.title: Malaysian Oud
MALAYSIAN.subtitle: Balanced & Refined
MALAYSIAN.description: Malaysian oud perfection. Balanced and refined with sophisticated depth.

LAOTIAN.title: Laotian Oud
LAOTIAN.subtitle: Exotic & Unique
LAOTIAN.description: Discover Laotian oud. Exotic and unique with distinctive character.

MUKHALLAT.title: Dehn Al Oud
MUKHALLAT.subtitle: Pure Oil Perfection
MUKHALLAT.description: Discover Dehn Al Oud. Pure oil perfection for connoisseurs - the ultimate expression of oud artistry.
